meanings.definition: (ユダヤ暦の)シェバト月 (通常1月下旬から3月上旬)
meanings.english_definition: The eleventh month of the civil year and the fifth month of the ecclesiastical year in the Hebrew calendar, usually falling in January–February.

examples.sentence: Tu BiShvat falls in the month of Shevat.
examples.translation: トゥ・ビシュバットはシェバト月にあたります。
